p: Standards of sugars including arabinose, xylose, glucose, fructose, mannose, galactose, maltose and sucrose were purchased from Sigma Aldrich (St Louis, MO, USA). Standards of amino acids were obtained from Thermo Scientific (Rockford, IL, USA). Acetonitrile of HPLC grade was acquired from Tedia (Fairfield, OH, USA) and petroleum ether of ACS grade (boiling point of 35–60 °C) and ethanol were purchased from Merck (Darmstadt, Germany). AccQ-Fluor reagent kits and AccQ-Tag eluent A concentrate for amino acids analysis were provided by Waters (Dublin, Ireland).
